item.title: 波罗的海原油出口减少，俄罗斯原油出口回落
item.description:
普里莫尔斯克和乌斯季卢加的发货量比前一周减少了五分之一

。【原文：

Shipments from Primorsk and Ust-Luga were down by one-fifth from the previous week

】

item.title: 道富证券认为美联储最快将于 6 月降息半点
item.description: 国泰君安全球顾问公司（State Street Global Advisors）一反近期市场共识的鹰派转变，押注美联储最快将在 6 月份降息 50 个基点。【原文：State Street Global Advisors is bucking the recent hawkish shift in market consensus to bet that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates by 50 basis points as soon as June.】

item.title: 几内亚与合作伙伴为顶级铁矿获得 150 亿美元资金
item.description: 几内亚表示，西芒杜是全球最大的未开发铁矿石储量，参与该项目的股东已为该项目签署了 150 亿美元的融资协议。【原文：Guinea said shareholders involved in Simandou, the biggest untapped iron-ore reserve globally, have signed $15 billion in financing agreements for the project.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。市场在等待催化剂、对美联储基本情况的看法以及热门商品。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. Markets await a catalyst, views on the Fed’s base case and hot commodities. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 壳牌前首席执行官谈纽约上市的好处
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）前首席执行官表示，在美国上市的国际石油公司受益于更高的倍数、更容易获得资本以及更友好的投资者基础。【原文：International oil companies listed in the US benefit from higher multiples, greater access to capital and a friendlier investor base, according to Shell Plc’s former chief executive officer.】

item.title: 美国小型企业乐观情绪降至逾 11 年低点
item.description: 全美独立企业联合会（National Federation of Independent Business）的数据显示，由于销售预期下滑和通胀压力仍是问题所在，3 月份美国小企业的乐观情绪降至 11 年多来最低点。【原文：US small-business optimism dropped to a more than 11-year low in March as sales expectations slumped and inflationary pressures remained a trouble spot, according to the National Federation of Independent Business.】

item.title: 维托尔首席执行官证实能源贸易巨头涉足金属业
item.description: 维托尔集团（Vitol Group）证实，在长期退出市场后，该公司正开始重建金属交易账簿，未来将是 "令人兴奋的十年"。【原文：Vitol Group confirmed that it’s starting to rebuild a trading book for metals after a long stint out of the market, with an “exciting decade” ahead.】

item.title: 尽管财政紧缩，匈牙利仍将购买布达佩斯机场 80% 的股份
item.description: 匈牙利即将完成对布达佩斯机场公司（Budapest Airport Zrt.）的收购，在财政紧缩的情况下继续推进这项价值数十亿美元的收购。【原文：Hungary is finalizing the purchase of Budapest Airport Zrt., pushing ahead with a multi-billion dollar acquisition despite a fiscal crunch.】

item.title: 印度可能将更多食糖用于生产乙醇，出口希望受挫
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，印度可能会允许糖厂使用更多的甜味剂来制造乙醇，此举可能会降低很快放宽出口限制的可能性。【原文：India may allow sugar mills to use more of the sweetener to make ethanol, in a move likely to reduce the odds of easing export curbs any time soon, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说日本央行酝酿因薪资交易强劲而上调通胀观点
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在年度工资谈判结果出人意料地强劲之后，日本央行可能会在本月晚些时候的政策会议上考虑上调通胀预期。【原文：The Bank of Japan will likely consider raising its inflation forecast at a policy meeting later this month after surprisingly strong results from annual wage negotiations, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据 Kyodo 报道，Seven & I 计划将超市部门伊藤洋华堂上市
item.description: Kyodo 援引一位不愿透露姓名的人士的话报道称，Seven & i Holdings 正计划将其超市部门伊藤洋华堂上市。【原文：Seven & i Holdings is planning to list its supermarket unit Ito-Yokado, Kyodo reported, citing an unidentified person.】

item.title: 日元交易员正瞄准每美元 152 美元关键价位之后的暴跌
item.description: 货币交易商正押注日元将跌破人们密切关注的 1 美元兑 152 日元的水平，并加大了对日元跌向 155 日元的押注。【原文：Currency traders are betting that the yen will tumble beyond the closely-watched 152 per dollar level, and are ramping up wagers on a slide toward 155.】

item.title: 欧盟经济部长称欧盟需要自己的财政部来发行欧洲债券
item.description: 欧盟经济部长表示，欧盟应建立一个中央金库，通过发行欧元债券为共同商品融资，因为欧盟面临着加强国防部门的巨大支出需求。【原文：The European Union’s economy chief said the bloc should create a central treasury that can finance common goods through the issuance of eurobonds, as the EU confronts massive spending demands to bolster its defense sector.】

item.title: 锂电世界在经历史诗般的繁荣与萧条之后面对严峻的事实
item.description: 锂价格的复苏蹒跚不前，这再次提醒人们，为什么近几年的大幅反弹之后会出现更令人惊叹的暴跌：一个快速扩张的行业比以往任何时候都更有准备继续提供供应。【原文：A stuttering recovery in lithium prices is providing a fresh reminder of why the dramatic rally of recent years was followed by an even more breathtaking collapse: a fast-expanding industry that is more prepared than ever to keep pumping out supplies.】

item.title: 日本央行上田为进一步缩减刺激政策敞开大门
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）对进一步缩减宽松货币政策保持开放态度，避免在日元徘徊在34年低点附近时发出明显的鸽派声音。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda kept his options open for a further paring back of monetary easing as he avoided sounding clearly dovish with the yen hovering near a 34-year low.】

item.title: 俄罗斯和中国将致力于 "双反 "美国领导的联盟
item.description: 俄罗斯和中国同意就欧亚安全问题展开对话，目的是 "双重对抗 "以美国为首的欧洲-大西洋联盟。【原文：Russia and China agreed to start a dialogue on Eurasian security with the aim of “double counteracting” the European-Atlantic alliance led by the US.】

item.title: 霍尔图姆称，特拉菲古拉公司非常看好电力需求
item.description: Trafigura 集团对电力需求 "非常看好"，并与其他贸易公司一起建立全球电力贸易业务。【原文：Trafigura Group is “incredibly bullish” on demand for electricity as it joins other trading houses in building out a global power trading business.】

item.title: 欧洲央行称欧元区企业贷款需求大幅下降
欧洲天然气波动接近两周高点，液化天然气被转运至亚洲
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格在两周来的最高水平附近波动，因为有迹象表明，装载这种燃料的船只正在转向其他市场。【原文：European natural gas prices fluctuated near the highest level in two weeks amid signs that vessels with the fuel are favoring other markets.】

item.title: 阿达尼绿色公司正在商谈筹集 4 亿美元离岸贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿达尼绿色能源有限公司（Adani Green Energy Ltd.）正在洽谈通过离岸贷款筹集约 4 亿美元的资金，亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）旗下的这家公司正在为一个即将开工的可再生能源项目寻求资金。【原文：Adani Green Energy Ltd. is in talks to raise about $400 million through an offshore loan as the unit of billionaire Gautam Adani seeks funds for an upcoming renewable project, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 麦格理是陷入困境的泰晤士水务公司的贷款人之一
item.description: 麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd. ）是向泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water）提供贷款的银行之一。【原文：Macquarie Group Ltd. is among the banks that lent to Thames Water, Britain’s biggest water supplier that’s been engulfed in uncertainty over its debt pile.】

item.title: 新兴股票指数创近两年来最高收盘价
item.description: 受亚洲芯片制造商股价大涨的影响，新兴市场股市周二上涨，并创下自 2022 年 6 月以来的最佳收盘价。【原文：Emerging market stocks were rising Tuesday and headed for their best close since June 2022, aided by a surge in the shares of an Asian chipmaker.】

item.title: 电力行业表示，日本需要新核电来实现绿色目标
item.description: 据日本主要电力公司称，日本将需要新的核电站来实现其 2050 年净零排放的目标。【原文：Japan will need new nuclear power plants to meet its 2050 net zero goal, according to nation’s main electricity utilities.】

item.title: 津巴布韦新 ZiG 货币在交易第二天走强
item.description: 津巴布韦中央银行表示，津巴布韦的新货币 ZiG 在发行一天后走强。【原文：Zimbabwe’s new currency, the ZiG, strengthened a day after its debut, the central bank said.】

item.title: 高盛中国联席主管莫尔斯将在任职 16 年后退休
item.description: 根据一份内部备忘录，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s co-head of its China business, E.G. Morse, will retire after 16 years at the firm, according to an internal memo.】

item.title: 土耳其因加沙空投禁令限制对以色列出口
item.description: 在以色列反对土耳其向加沙地带空投援助物资的计划后，土耳其宣布限制对以色列的出口，土耳其总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安因没有停止与以色列的贸易而受到批评。【原文：Turkey announced restrictions on exports to Israel after it opposed planned Turkish aid drops over the Gaza Strip and President Recep Tayyip Erdogan faced criticism for not stopping trade with the country.】

item.title: 英国石油公司第一季度石油天然气贸易表现强劲
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）预计第一季度贸易业务将表现强劲，石油买卖业绩将显著改善。【原文：BP Plc expects to report a strong performance from its trading business for the first quarter, with a notable improvement in results from buying and selling oil.】

item.title: 欧洲央行与美联储分歧引发欧元跌至美元平价的讨论
item.description: 由于欧洲央行的决策者们看来今年将比美国同行实施更多的降息措施，欧元触及美元平价的说法又开始出现。【原文：Talk of the euro touching parity with the dollar is returning as policymakers at the European Central Bank look primed to deliver more interest-rate cuts this year than their US peers.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国市场现在的动向
中国工商银行计划出售 55 亿美元损失吸收债券
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，中国工商银行股份有限公司计划最快于本月发行高达 400 亿元人民币（合 55 亿美元）的总损失吸收能力（TLAC）债券，这是中国最大的国有贷款机构首次出售此类债券。【原文：Industrial and Commercial Bank of China Ltd. is planning to issue as much as 40 billion yuan ($5.5 billion) of total loss-absorbing capacity (TLAC) bonds as soon as this month, people familiar with the matter said, marking the first such debt sale from the country’s largest state-owned lenders.】
